awards.description: THE CHILKOOT INDIAN ASSOCIATION WILL BUILD ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY THROUGH MANAGEMENT OF THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, RESEARCHING CLIMATE CHANGE IMPACTS

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE CHILKOOT INDIAN ASSOCIATION TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.  SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL PARTNER WITH OTHER NON-PROFITS AND TRIBES ON ENVIRONMENTAL PROJECTS; ADDRESS MARINE TRASH ISSUES IN TRADITIONAL USE AREAS; PARTICIPATE IN RELEVANT TRAINING.   NOTE: THE INDIRECT COST RATE AGREEMENT ON FILE WITH EPA EXPIRES ON 12/31/2020, YOU MAY NOT DRAW DOWN FUNDS FOR INDIRECT COSTS WITHOUT A CURRENT, APPROVED RATE IN PLACE.

DESCRIPTION:CHILKOOT INDIAN ASSOCIATION WILL USE THESE FUNDS FOR BUILDING TRIBAL CAPACITY TO DEVELOP ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THROUGH GATHERING BASELINE WATER QUALITY DATA; ADDRESSING INDOOR AIR QUALITY THROUGH EDUCATION AND OUTREACH; PARTICIPATING IN ENVIRONMENTAL TRAINING; MEETING THE FEDERAL ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAMMATIC REQUIREMENTS INCLUDING WORKING WITH TRIBAL COUNCIL TO UPDATE TRIBAL ETEP PRIORITIES.ACTIVITIES:APPLICANT WILL CONTINUE TO BUILD THE ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM THROUGH PARTICIPATING IN ENVIRONMENTAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE TRAINING, GATHERING INFORMATION ON AIR AND WATER QUALITY ISSUES.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:CAPACITY OF THE TRIBAL STAFF AND ENVIRONMENTAL DEPARTMENT WILL BE INCREASED BY ATTENDING TRAININGS AND MEETINGS OTHER ORGANIZATIONS. THE TRIBE WILL ENSURE THAT ITS TRIBAL MEMBERS WILL HAVE GOOD CLEAN AIR AND WATER BY COLLECTING ENVIRONMENTAL DATA AND PARTICIPATING IN EDUCATION AND OUTREACH. AGENDAS, NOTES, TRAINING AND TRIP REPORTS WILL BE GENERATED.  THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES ARE THE MEMBERS OF THE CHILKOOT INDIAN ASSOCIATION.
CHILKOOT COMMUNITY ELECTRIC VEHICLE AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT INFRASTRUCTURE HUB
